pkgmetadata.longdescription: Macros Generating 'nimble' Code // Macros to generate 'nimble' code from a concise syntax. Included are macros for generating linear modeling code using a formula-based syntax and for building for() loops. For more details review the 'nimble' manual: https://r-nimble.org/html_manual/cha-writing- models.html#subsec:macros.
